Topic.Title: Objects not Registering when Playing Game

Posts.EditableText: I set a certain item as a container and added another object inside it, with the object inside takeable and the container not openable unless the player types in a certain command that runs a script to open it, and I set the container so that the object inside it is removeable. All of this shows up in the options for these objects when I'm in Quest, but when I run my game, the container opens when I type in the right command but when I type in "remove ... from ..." or "take ..." it just says "I can't see that here." What am I doing wrong?
Posts.HTML:
